SEARCH
Package game.mills

Class Board

java.lang.Object
game.mills.Board
public class Board extends Object
The Board class represents the game board. It handles all operations concerning the board, including: - Checking for mills - Checking neighboring nodes - Validating moves

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Board()
    Constructs a new Board and initializes the game graph.

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board()
      Constructs a new Board and initializes the game graph. Creates the nodes and edges based on predefined constants.

  • Method Details

    • getNode

      public Node getNode(int id)
      Retrieves the node at the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the node.
      Returns:
      The node at the specified ID.

    • getEdges

      public int[][] getEdges()
      Returns the edges constant, representing connections between nodes.
      Returns:
      The edges constant.

    • getMills

      public int[][] getMills()
      Returns the mills constant, representing possible mills (three connected stones).
      Returns:
      The mills constant.

    • getNeighbours

      public List<Node> getNeighbours(Node node)
      Gets the neighbors of a given node. These are nodes connected directly to the given node.
      Parameters:
      node - The node for which neighbors are to be fetched.
      Returns:
      A list of neighboring nodes.

    • isValidMove

      public boolean isValidMove(Node from, Node to)
      Validates if a move between two nodes is valid based on their adjacency.
      Parameters:
      from - The starting node of the move.
      to - The destination node of the move.
      Returns:
      True if the move is valid, false otherwise.

    • placePiece

      public void placePiece(Player player, int nodeID)
      Places a player's stone on a specified node.
      Parameters:
      player - The player placing the stone.
      nodeID - The node where the stone will be placed.

    • movePiece

      public void movePiece(Player player, int fromID, int toID)
      Moves a player's stone from one node to another.
      Parameters:
      player - The player making the move.
      fromID - The starting node.
      toID - The destination node.

    • checkMill

      public boolean checkMill(Node node, Player player)
      Checks if placing or moving a stone forms a mill (three consecutive stones).
      Parameters:
      node - The node where the stone is placed or moved to.
      player - The player making the move.
      Returns:
      True if the player forms a mill, false otherwise.

    • allOpponentStonesInMill

      public boolean allOpponentStonesInMill(Player opponent)
      Checks if all of an opponent's stones are part of mills. If all stones are in mills, the player can remove a mill stone.
      Parameters:
      opponent - The opponent whose stones are checked.
      Returns:
      True if all of the opponent's stones are in mills, false otherwise.

    • hasValidMoves

      public boolean hasValidMoves(Player player)
      Checks if the player has any valid moves left. A valid move is available if any neighboring node is unoccupied.
      Parameters:
      player - The player whose available moves are checked.
      Returns:
      True if the player has at least one valid move, false otherwise.
